thread.title: 'Saturday Night Live' books Adele, Matthew McConaughey for Nov. 21
thread.title_full: 'Saturday Night Live' books Adele, Matthew McConaughey for Nov. 21 - UPI.com

author: Karen Butler
title: 'Saturday Night Live' books Adele, Matthew McConaughey for Nov. 21
text:
NEW YORK, Oct. 26 (UPI) -- Oscar-winning actor Matthew McConaughey is to host Saturday Night Live on Nov. 21, NBC announced Monday.
The musical guest for the show that evening will be Grammy Award-winner Adele.
McConaughey recently completed production on the films Free State of Jones and Gold , while Adele's widely anticipated third album 25 is due out Nov. 20.
  Adele releases music video for new song 'Hello' 'Walking Dead' producer Scott Gimple sheds faint light on show's latest shocking plot twist Kurtwood Smith joins the cast of 'Marvel's Agent Carter' Peter Capaldi to remain on 'Doctor Who' for at least a third season
